meanings.definition: The condition of having six sets of chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: Hexaploidies can result in unique genetic combinations.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the hexaploidies in the plant species.
meanings.sent3: The hexaploidies of the cells made the geneticists scratch their heads.
meanings.sent4: In the world of genetics, hexaploidies are like a complex puzzle with six pieces.
meanings.sent5: The hexaploidies of the organism were a fascinating subject for research.

meanings.sent1: The hexaploidies of the organism were evident under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Hexaploidies can lead to increased genetic diversity.
meanings.sent3: The hexaploidies of the plant made it stand out in the garden.
meanings.sent4: In the field of biology, hexaploidies represent a rich genetic pool.
meanings.sent5: The hexaploidies of the species were a topic of discussion among biologists.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hexaploid.
meanings.sent1: The hexaploidies of the cells were a key focus of the research.
meanings.sent2: Hexaploidies can impact the overall health of an organism.
meanings.sent3: The hexaploidies of the population surprised the geneticists.
meanings.sent4: In genetics, hexaploidies are like a symphony of six chromosomes.
meanings.sent5: The hexaploidies of the species were a genetic marvel to behold.
